q: 2012 Colin Powell says he's uncommitted in 2012- POLITICO Live: Colin Powell says he's uncommitted in 2012 Colin Powell said on Sunday that he was not committed to supporting Barack Obama or any other candidate in 2012 I'm not committed to Barack Obama .
